thread.title: Trip to London
thread.title_full: Trip to London - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Stephen C
title: Trip to London
text:
Overall the hotel was excellent. The room was a bit cramped for hanging and putting away clothes but the iron was a nice touch. The TV stations were very limited for evening viewing. Fabulous location! Close to everything.
Room Tip: Higher floors are better, especially those overlooking Buckingham Palace Road. See more room tips
